summary: An imaginative children's film about a young Australian boy's passion for flight and his challenge to compete in the World Paper Plane Championships in Japan.
cast: Sam Worthington|Ed Oxenbould|Deborah Mailman|Ena Imai|Nicholas Bakopoulos-Cooke|Julian Dennison|Terry Norris|Peter Rowsthorn|David Wenham|Alex Williams|Prea Cunningham|Talei Howell-Price|Daniel Holliday|Caroline McKenzie|Sally Sander|Nicole Trunfio|Paul Dawber|Patt Hallahan|Yaron Zeilinger|Kim Fleming|Andrew Hale|Shane Adamczak|Chase Rafferty|Izumi Woods|Toshi Okuzaki|Seamus Harrison|Skye Robinson|Noah D'Annunzio|Jacob Brown|Chad Smith|Billie Jean Hamlet|Sophie Nardini|Maki Imai|Rimi Imai|Leo Taylor|Dene Irvin|Zachary Brazier|Ryan Cruickshank|Masami Takeuchi|Ryuji Nakagawa|Shingo Usami|Yolanie Chong|Jessica Cruickshank|Max Tran|Lizzy Kay|Filippo Gioffre|Hiroyuki Fujita|Andrew Bongiovanni|Alex Bryans|Nicholas Coombe|Josephine Hirst|Kenny Low|Joanna Money|Melody Rom|Mary Soudi|Sam Stopforth|Siena Uremovic
title: Aviones de papel
